# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# AtCoder Beginner Contest
 
 
if __name__ == '__main__':
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = 0
 
    for i in range(n):
        ans += 1 / a[i]
 
    print(1 / ans)
import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


# n = int(input())
# x = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = [1, 2, 3]

n = int(input())

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

#!/usr/bin/env python3

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')  # 正の最大値
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)
import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

# print(x)

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n//2] - x[n//2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
# print(x)
x.sort()
min_cost = float('inf')
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)
print(min_cost)
